sentence.Network_en: The vulture extended his scrawny neck.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: variant of dialect scranny; compare with archaic scrannel 'weak, feeble (referring to sound) '

entry.tran: 骨瘦如柴的;皮包骨头的
entry.def: If you describe a person or animal as scrawny, you mean that they look unattractive because they are so thin.

example.ex: ...a scrawny woman with dyed black hair...
example.tran: 染了黑发、骨瘦如柴的女人

example.ex: The vulture extended his scrawny neck.
